name: Lost Treasure (BKurrStudio)
description:
*Please note: This is a trial first level for the game. I am testing importing and using FBX files I've created myself.  There is still much refining of game the mechanics to implement but I wanted to get it out there for some feedback. 

Title: Lost Treasure

Platform: PC/Web

Genre: Action/Adventure

Rating: E for Everyone

Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: You were separated from your family when you were capture and held for questioning. Your guards accidentally left your cell unlocked so you have a chance to escape. You must navigate the dungeon to find the seeker stone that was stolen from you. Its magic will help increase your speed and toughness and can be used to search out items or people. You need it to help you escape and find your family. 

Instructions: WASD to move around, shift to sprint, and space bar to jump. 

Game Design Team: Bridget Kurr – Game Designer

Credit and special thanks to upklyak, pikisuperstar, babysofja, and ambassador80 on Freepik, adobe stock, depositphotos, and blueskypapers for images used as wood and book textures. 

Credit and special thanks to Mixamo.com for the player character and DancingEyebrows (Unity Asset Store) for the goblin character and animations. 

Credit and a special thanks to the creative commons contributors on freesound.org for the music and sound effects.
